effects: You always have the spells in the Light Domain Spells table prepared at the cleric levels shown.
You expend one use of Channel Divinity to emit a 30-foot emanation of light.
Magical darkness in the area is dispelled.
Creatures of your choice in the area make a Constitution save; on a failed save, they take radiant damage equal to 2d10 + your cleric level, or half as much on a success.

feature_defs.trigger: when a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an attack roll
effects: You impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

effects: You regain all expended uses of Warding Flare when you finish a short or long rest.
You emit an aura of sunlight for 1 minute (or until you dismiss it).
You emit bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.
Enemies in the bright light have disadvantage on saving throws against your Radiance of the Dawn and any spell that deals fire or radiant damage.
